author: rgodfrey
msg: QPID-5818 : [Java Broker] creating children from within the configuration thread leads to deadlock as the configuration thread blocks waiting for a task which cannot be executed because it needs the config thread.  Instead use asynchronous child creation.

msg: LUCENE-6394: Add two-phase support to SpanNotQuery
